timeline.bodyText: Is this method being used anywhere (after your changes)?
timeline.author: shahzaibj

replies.bodyText: Probably.  I just moved it from the non-abstract class to the abstract class.  HttpRequest.sendWithMethod delegates here.
replies.author: AdamBJohnsonx

timeline.message:
Add abstract class for HttpClient

Implementations of HttpClient need to implament a lot of functionality.
We really only care about one thing, so handle that.
